modShortDescription: Tracks how many of each different type of entity you've killed in the game (zombie or type of animal) and with what weapon.
modDescription:
Tracks how many of each different type of entity youâ€™ve killed in the game (zombie or type of animal) and with what [weapon](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-weapons/) (guns only, may consider adding melee in the future).

**[Download](https://gitlab.com/KhaineGB/khaines-modlets-a19/-/archive/master/khaines-modlets-a19-master.zip?path=KHA19-KillTracking)**
